Package com.arjuna.ArjunaCore.Implementation.ObjectStore

Class Summary
ActionStore The basic transaction log implementation.
ActionStoreSetup  
FileLockingStore An refinement of the basic FileSystemStore which provides file-level locking.
FileSystemStore The basic class for file system object stores.
HashedActionStore The basic action store implementations store the object states in a separate file within the same directory in the object store, determined by the object's type.
HashedActionStoreSetup  
HashedStore The basic shadowing store implementations store the object states in a separate file within the same directory in the object store, determined by the object's type.
HashedStoreSetup  
ObjectStoreSetup  
ObjectStoreType The various types of object store implementations that are available.
ShadowingStore A shadowing file store implementation.
ShadowingStoreSetup  
ShadowNoFileLockStore Almost the same as the ShadowingStore implementation, but assumes all concurrency control is provided by the object.
ShadowNoFileLockStoreSetup
